TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sadu, title = Sadu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sadu} }

S.FORM: sadu Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantou ko sadu a niyaro', 101 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 366 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 348 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 18 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq82%, Tayal10%, Bunun3%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

sado Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantoo ko sado a niyaro', 101 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 366 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 348 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 18 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq82%, Tayal10%, Bonon3%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
